abilities.name: Sniper Mode
abilities.description: Aim through your sniper scope and fire long range attacks. While scoped in, the damage of your next shot steadily increases.

abilities.name: Headhunter
abilities.description: For 5 seconds successful shots made to the upper half of an enemy character will deal 100% increased damage

abilities.name: Oppressor mine
abilities.description: Kinessa throws out up to 2 mines that activate once they land. While active the Oppressor Mine will slow a single enemy player within 40ft

abilities.name: Transporter
abilities.description: Hold F to deploy a Transporter. Tapping F while a Transporter is deployed will teleport you to the Transporter

abilities.name: Sniper Rifle
abilities.description: A combination weapon that fires as an energy cabine or a powerful laser rifle
